scripts.jshint:watch: npm run jshint && onchange "**/*.js" ".jshint*" -- npm run jshint
scripts.build: npm run jshint && npm run compile && istanbul cover _mocha -- --recursive --compilers js:babel-core/register --reporter mocha-junit-reporter test/unit
scripts.patch: git reset --hard HEAD && git clean -fd && npm run compile && npm version patch -m "[ci skip] %s" && git push origin master && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
